import axios from'axios';const API='/api/orders';// Configure axios to send credentials with all requests
axios.defaults.withCredentials=true;const orderService={getOrders:async()=>{const res=await axios.get("".concat(API,"/history"));return res.data;},placeOrder:async orderData=>{const res=await axios.post("".concat(API,"/place"),orderData);return res.data.order;},getAllOrders:async()=>{const res=await axios.get("".concat(API,"/all"));return res.data;},updateOrderStatus:async(orderId,status)=>{await axios.put("".concat(API,"/update-status/").concat(orderId),{status});}};export default orderService;
